TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPageAdapter implements class System.Web.UI.MobileControls.IControlAdapter

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 定義頁面配置器的介面。

span.span: Defines the interface to a page adapter.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站 (機器翻譯)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有頁面配置器必須都實作這個介面。All page adapters must implement this interface. 此介面繼承自介面，以便實作此介面的任何類別也必須實作介面。This interface inherits from the interface, so any class that implements this interface must also implement the interface. 最簡單的解決方案為自基底類別，可提供的預設實作介面。The easiest solution is to derive a class from the base class, which provides a default implementation of the interface.

permission.span: 用於裝載環境中的作業。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱輸出快取中[行動文字寫入器呈現的最佳作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28893297-2c45-4c57-a2b3-9cdd5898f988)。For more information, see Output Caching in [Mobile Text Writer Rendering Best Practices](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28893297-2c45-4c57-a2b3-9cdd5898f988).

summary.span: 使用這個屬性 (Property)，透過 URL 查詢字串來持續要求之間的資料。

span.span: Use this property to persist data between requests through the use of the URL query string.

summary.span: 這個 API 已經過時。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站 (機器翻譯)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 使用 URL 查詢字串保存之資料的字典。

span.span: A dictionary of data that has been persisted through the use of the URL query string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會填入時有效類型都設定為的屬性 < `mobileControls` > 組態項目。This property is populated when a valid type is configured as an attribute of the < `mobileControls` > configuration element.

span.span: if the items from the property are persisted in the query string; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值是`true`根據預設，如果`CookielessDataDictionaryType`中的項目`MobileControls`組態區段的 Web.config 設定為有效的字典類型。This value is `true` by default, if the `CookielessDataDictionaryType` entry in the `MobileControls` configuration section of Web.config is set to a valid dictionary type.
